title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the estimate

1 point is earned for the interpretation with units

W'(12)≈ W(15)−W(9) 15−9 = 67.9−61.8 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4F72@

=1.017 (or 1.016)

The water temperature is increasing at a rate of approximately 1.0170 F per minute at time

t =12 minutes.
